rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a traditional Chettinad-style archway, incorporating floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting and Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
An expansive living room designed in Chettinad style with rich wood finishes, open layout for family gatherings, and floor-to-ceiling windows.
A formal dining area complemented by traditional Chettinad detailing, designed to host family and guests, with an integrated open space concept.
A well-organized kitchen featuring modern appliances with traditional elements, efficient workflow layout in line with Vastu principles.
A guest bedroom incorporating Chettinad aesthetics with traditional motifs, ensuring privacy and comfort.
A second guest bedroom designed to provide additional comfort and space for visitors.
A dedicated study area with a modern desk and ample storage, blending traditional elements.
A utility space for laundry and storage, designed to maintain a clean aesthetic.
An outdoor recreational space featuring a swimming pool with adjacent deck and seating area, following Vastu guidelines for water placement.
A fully equipped private gym designed for fitness enthusiasts, with ample space and modern equipment.
The master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, luxurious finishes and traditional Chettinad design.
A spacious en-suite bathroom designed to complement the master bedroom with high-end finishes.
A dedicated closet area within the master bedroom suite.

openings.description: A main entry door in the south direction following Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy.
A secondary exit leading to the swimming pool and garden area.
Balcony openings designed with floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural light and ventilation.

additional_features.description: The ground floor incorporates elements of split-level design to maximize natural light and efficient space utilization.
Design elements such as placement of windows, doors, and swimming pool are aligned with Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
